mapper.select:
SELECT a.ID, a.PARENT_ID, a.DATE, a.PROJECT, a.REDUCTION, a.PLUS, a.NOTE, a.ADDTIME, b.UNITNAME FROM tb_enterprise_eval a,tb_enterprise_info b where 1=1 and a.PARENT_ID=b.id
AND a.PARENT_ID = #{parent_id}

SELECT a.ID, a.PARENT_ID, a.DATE, a.PROJECT, a.REDUCTION, a.PLUS, a.NOTE, a.ADDTIME, b.UNITNAME FROM tb_enterprise_eval a,tb_enterprise_info b where 1=1 and a.PARENT_ID=b.id
AND a.PARENT_ID = #{parent_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_enterprise_eval (ID, PARENT_ID, DATE, PROJECT, REDUCTION, PLUS, NOTE, ADDTIME) VALUES(#{id},#{parent_id}, #{date}, #{project}, #{reduction}, #{plus}, #{note}, CONVERT(varchar(20), getdate(), 120 ) )
